sentences: Parties were briefed on the two contact groups that had considered different elements of this topic the SBI group and the joint SBI/SBSTA group.

The SBI adopted draft conclusions relating to the EGTT, GEF strategic programme, and the terms of reference for the review of implementation of Convention Articles 4.1(c) and 4.5 (FCCC/SBI/2008/L.28 and Add.1).
